title: Leatt 4.0 Enduro Helmet with removable chinbar delivers DH-certified protection
content:
Leatt have added a convertible full face helmet to their range of protection; the Twenty21 4.0 Enduro Helmet. With a removable chinbar, 360Â° Turbine Technology, FIDLOCK real estate and DH-certified safety ratings, the Leatt 4.0 offers everything you’d need (and more) out of both a full face and open-face enduro helmet. Leatt Twenty21 4.0 Enduro […]
